title: Network error every game?
body:
So after the last two patches, I've been getting "Network error" popping up and I decide to reconnect sometimes it does but most times I have to restart my client all-together. which makes me really late to the game, is there any way to fix this?

I haven't been able to connect in time to a SINGLE GAME.

and it's starting to annoy the crap out of me.

replies.body:
You may want to take a step back and try troubleshooting this connection issue in a custom or practice game until it's figured out before hopping back into matchmade games, I don't want you getting any penalties for something like this.

Check out the steps in this [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to first make sure your network settings are configured in the best way. There's also a few other good troubleshooting steps that can help cover the basics. If that doesn't seem to help then go ahead and hit up our techs in a [**ticket**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
